com.cloudycrew.cloudycar.elasticsearch

Interface IElasticSearchService<T extends Identifiable>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type being queried from elastic search
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ElasticSearchService

    public interface IElasticSearchService<T extends Identifiable>
    Created by George on 2016-10-23.

    • Method Summary

        Gets all items stored in Elastic Search
